*** This document contains sample results from calculation
of integrals using the left rectangle rule and the trapezoid
rule, with a precision of 0.00001 and relative error used
to test the precision of the calculations. The exact number
of loops and final answer that you get will depend on your
precision and the type of error that you used. ***
